title: Easy to handle
content: The carbon belt drive offers a wonderfully smooth ride, at the same time being low-maintenance and reliable. Dirt and oil stains, as was the case with chain drives, are now a thing of the past. The twist shift grip and Magura hydraulic rim brakes guarantee comfortable and safe everyday cycling. And the standard Abus frame lock is just as reliable.
